meanings.definition: A person who walks ahead of golfers to spot where their balls land.
meanings.sent1: The forecaddies pointed out the location of the golf balls.
meanings.sent2: During the game, the forecaddies helped the golfers find their balls.
meanings.sent3: The forecaddies joked about having to chase after the golf balls all day.
meanings.sent4: The forecaddies were like human golf ball detectors on the course.
meanings.sent5: The role of forecaddies is crucial in ensuring a smooth golf game.
